name: Detective Slate: Robot PI
description:
Content Warning - Language & Smoking/Alcohol Use

You take the role of Detective Slate, a Robot PI tasked with identifying the leader of a human rebel group at a bar in 1920's New York.  Look around the area for clues, talk to bar patrons to gain information, enjoy the music, and choose wisely.

Created for Chill Jam over two weeks by a team of 4, all code and assets (except fonts) were made in that time.

  • Adriel Claflin - Character Art
  • Alieha Dryden - Backgrounds & Story
  • Chris Dahrens - Coding & UI
  • John Kiser - Music & Sound Effects

Point and click scenes with hidden clues and characters.  Spacebar and 1-5 keys to navigate dialogue.

(Update 1 was released post jam to fix some bugs and a dialogue tree error that made it impossible to leave  the second conversation with the Mysterious Man, and is recommended for those that want to experience the game in a more polished state.)
